column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Pork chashu bowl - 3/5 - Decent taste
column2: poor value. I love this dish
column3: so I was disappointed by the tiny pieces of chashu (nothing like the chunks in the menu) that might've filled a shot glass. For the same price
column4: I could get a regular size bowl with 5x the amount of pork elsewhere.
